string-array.name: actor_additional_info
string-array.item: Keanu Reeves was born on September 2, 1964, in Beirut, Lebanon. Known for his role as Neo in "The Matrix" trilogy, he is widely recognized for his philanthropy and is considered one of the nicest people in Hollywood.

Carrie-Anne Moss, born on August 21, 1967, in Burnaby, British Columbia, Canada. In addition to her role in "The Matrix," she has a diverse career in film and television, known for her strong and dynamic performances.
Laurence Fishburne, born on July 30, 1961, in Augusta, Georgia, USA. An acclaimed actor and producer, he portrayed Morpheus in "The Matrix" series, earning critical acclaim for his performance.
Hugo Weaving, born on April 4, 1960, in Ibadan, Nigeria. A versatile actor known for his roles in various films, he played the iconic character Agent Smith in "The Matrix."
Joe Pantoliano, born on September 12, 1951, in Hoboken, New Jersey, USA. An accomplished actor, he portrayed Cypher in "The Matrix," bringing depth to the complex character.
Gloria Foster, born on November 15, 1933, in Chicago, Illinois, USA. A talented actress, she played the enigmatic Oracle in "The Matrix" series.
Jada Pinkett Smith, born on September 18, 1971, in Baltimore, Maryland, USA. An actress, producer, and director, she portrayed Niobe in the later installments of "The Matrix."
Collin Chou, born on August 11, 1967, in Taipei, Taiwan. A martial artist and actor, he played the role of Seraph, the guardian of the Oracle, in "The Matrix Reloaded" and "The Matrix Revolutions."
Monica Bellucci, born on September 30, 1964, in Città di Castello, Italy. An acclaimed actress and model, she portrayed Persephone in "The Matrix Reloaded" and "The Matrix Revolutions."
Harold Perrineau, born on August 7, 1963, in Brooklyn, New York, USA. An actor and producer, he played the role of Link, a hovercraft pilot, in "The Matrix Reloaded" and "The Matrix Revolutions."
